text: Ani tyahuna adhika atyacari kona asela, jo allahababata khote racela. He loka apalya palanakartyasamora sadara kele jatila ani saksa denare sarva mhanatila ki he ase loka aheta jyanni apalya palanakartyavisayi asatya racale. Khabaradara! Allahatarphe dhikkaraca mara ahe asa atyacari lokanvara
